headline: NextEra (NEE) Positioned for Growth, Says Goldman as It Reiterates Buy
summary: NextEra Energy Inc. (NYSE:NEE) is one of the best defensive stocks to invest in according to analysts. On July 23, Goldman Sachs analyst Carly Davenport reiterated a Buy rating on NextEra Energy and kept the price target unchanged at $91. Despite a recent pullback in the stock following Q2 results, Davenport remains confident in the company’s […]
